Articles.Content:
I have actually been playing the game since 0.18, but when I first started playing the game I couldn't register for some reason. So I have finally tried it again and it worked!!

I would just like to say that this game is amazing and I just love seeing all the improvements from the hard working team at Squad and ALL the modder's out there - keep up the good work guys! Lastly, I will be of any help to any new players of the game in any way I can, because this forum is where I learned a lot when I first started. Safe voyages and soft landings to all!
Hi SkegeeDude. There are always people needing help in the Gameplay section, so your services will no doubt be welcomed there.

Welcome to the forums.

Safe voyages and soft landings to all!

Also last time I attempted a soft landing i crashed.
